meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek garment worn by men and women.
meanings.sent1: In ancient Greece, people wore himations to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: The actors in the play were dressed in colorful himations.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone showed up wearing himations.
meanings.sent4: Her love for history was like a cozy himation wrapping around her.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the himation fluttered in the gentle breeze.

meanings.sent3: The collection of himations was a sight to behold.
